Mitra.text: Received your letter; order will be attended to

Mixtim.text: Received your letter; orders will be attended to at once

Mixtura.text: Received your letter; too busy to attend to matter

Mobilior.text: Received your letter; too unwell to write

Modestia.text: Received your letter; too unwell to attend to matter

Modius.text: Received your letter; will do as you wish

Modulate.text: Received your letter; will post you particulars of ---

Molimen.text: What is the date of the last letter

Molitura.text: Do your utmost to avoid litigation

Mollesca.text: Lose no time in the matter

Monedula.text: Do not lose an instant, but come at once

Monitor.text: Luggage has been left behind; enquire at the station

Monstro.text: Leave your luggage at the cloakroom to be called for

Moralis.text: Send a conveyance to take the luggage

Morbidus.text: Will send a man to take charge of the luggage
